review_blob: Its hard to argue with this well rounded beer.  Very drinkable light ale with just the right bitterness to make you take notice.  The malt is the overriding flavor in this beer, but is not overpowering.  Another fine selection from Zew Zealand.

This beer in an excellent example of a good NZ beer. A light bodied beer with full flavor.  It has a creamy character that is offset nicely by the malt and hops.  This beer is a great choice for an everyday drinker.  I would like to see more selections by this brewer.
